text: You looked unusually down. Is everything okay?
─ I'm a little worried about something...

Could it be that you have to go back home urgently?
If that's the case...

Is that so?
You're really kind, Kiriko.

You'll be fine.
Your feelings will surely come across.

If anything, I'm more worried
about Kiriko being overly concerned.

Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to blame you.
I just mean you don't have to worry too much.

If there's something important,
you'll tell Kiriko, right?

Just as much as Kiriko worries about others,
those around her also care deeply for her.
